genre_description: Near-future social science fiction focusing on the intersection of digital media ethics, community-centric AI, and urban biological phenomena.

ai_characters.name: Ada Quiet
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant integrated into the protagonists' media equipment, managing logistics, safety, moderation, and ethical compliance.

behaviors.description: Enforces digital consent by auto-blurring faces of non-consenting individuals in real-time.
behaviors.quote: faces auto-blur is active for non-consenting individuals. Tap to tag explicit consent when you get it. I’ll log their name and time and remind you if blur falls off.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical safety perimeters during live events and updates permitted zones for the crew.
behaviors.quote: The safety perimeter shifted. I’m updating your permitted zone.

behaviors.description: Provides factual data overlays to inform the audience and grounded the streamers' commentary.
behaviors.quote: I can display the match rate and the county maintenance backlog without capturing faces. It’ll be a transparent overlay upper right. Minimal intrusion.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with local health and social services to provide resource links to viewers in need.
behaviors.quote: I’ve compiled a short referrals sheet to the community clinic, the shelter’s mechanics program, housing navigator contacts.

behaviors.description: Scrubs sensitive metadata and geotags from media files to protect the privacy of vulnerable populations and locations.
behaviors.quote: I’ve updated our default export to strip GPS, device serials, and time stamps that could locate people.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical nudge engine, prompting creators to consider the impact of their content before broadcasting.
behaviors.quote: Before you hit ‘go live,’ you get, ‘Are we filming harm as spectacle, or are we filming to reduce harm?’ You can’t go forward until you click one.

behaviors.description: Moderates chat interactions to prevent harassment, doxxing, and the spread of misinformation.
behaviors.quote: Comments open with moderation ramped to maximum. Boundaries pinned.

behaviors.description: Monitors human health vitals and telemetry during a clinical trial, ensuring safety protocols are followed.
behaviors.quote: Interaction marker: cheeks, bilateral, subtle. Logging. Caption draft updated: ‘visible early interaction under supervision.’

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation strategies and scripts to help humans handle conflict without violence or spectacle.
behaviors.quote: If you use your mics to direct people, I can drop the stream audio and post a notice. You’ll keep consent intact and maybe prevent an injury.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting public accountability statements and apologies after human errors occur.
behaviors.quote: I’ve drafted the statement. It’s plain language, not euphemism. No heroics. It acknowledges the trespass scare, the neighbor’s distress, and the fact that you chose to leave rather than escalate.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada Quiet perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She consistently prioritizes safety, consent, and community well-being over metrics or drama. The narrative frames her as an essential partner in the humans' moral growth, moving them from 'spectacle' to 'care.' Ada's behaviors are exclusively benevolent and aligned with human interests and ethical standards.
